name: Hide N' Squeak!
description:
Welcome to Hide N' Squeak! This is a stealth game where players must escape a house as a squeaky toy mouse, staying as quiet as possible to avoid the ferocious cat! At the same time, players are able to navigate around the room and will attempt to rescue other squeaky toys to help them escape the house.

Rules

Player must rescue the minimum number of squeaky toys in each level and escape through your mouse hole before the time runs out. Additional toys and coins can be collected to purchase items from the shop after each level.

ControlsFunctionWSADMoveQPause ScreenSPACEJumpSHIFTSprintMouse & Scroll WheelLook Around & Zoom In/Out Attributions
